item.title: EsteemBeam Mobile Application
item.description: Back when I was a wee high school sophomore in 2017, a couple of my friends and I prototyped an app at the Girls Who Code Summer Immersion Program. And EsteemBeam was born! EsteemBeam is an iOS/Android app that sends self-help and motivational phrases at the user’s specified frequency â€“ daily, weekly, monthly, etc. Our target demographic was young girls, since the app’s phrases were formulated with common mental health struggles of adolescent girls in mind, such as body image or peer pressure.
